scripts.start: eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/site/assets/tailwind.css -c tailwind.config.js -o dist/assets/style.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/site/assets/tailwind.css -c tailwind.config.js -o dist/assets/style.css --minify
